title: POOKA 2: POOKA LIVES Ending Explained!
author: Think Story
comment: 🎵 POOKA SEE, POOKA DO, PRACTICE SOCIAL DISTANCING OR POOKA WILL COME FOR YOU! 🎵

The original “Pooka” movie was a dark story about a Father with anger problems who lost his wife and son in a car accident and is now reliving a dream were he is trying to bring his family together for Christmas, but tragically ruining it due to his own flaws and outburst manifested in a “Pooka suit” that he wears........I will say that the original “Pooka “ movie didn’t deserve a 5.5/10.......BUT THE SEQUEL DEFINITELY DESERVES IT!!!!!

The 2nd Pooka was pretty straight forward. The reason why I liked the 1st so much is because there was a good twist in the end and a hidden message/story that you had to figure out. I'm honestly disappointed in the 2nd one.
I prefer Pucca, the show about a Korean girl who has a crush on a local ninja.
5:43 So they're saying that Pooka is basically an enemy Stand.
description:
In this video we take a deep dive, review, recap and explain the ending to Hulu's Into the Dark Pooka 2: Pooka Lives!
